transcript.text: henry kissinger now says that ukraine
should just cede some territory to
russia which happens to be the exact
same opinion of noam chomsky this is
number one really kind of weird it
wouldn't be you wouldn't imagine that
henry kissinger from the right and noam
chomsky from the left would end up with
the same perspective on anything but
it's also a reminder how in 2022
there are some really strange i wouldn't
call it horseshoe theory where you go so
far left or right that you end up on the
other side but there are just some
really strange political factions being
staked out and that's exactly what we're
seeing here are you surprised to see
kissinger and chomsky on the same page
on this issue let me know in the
comments and remember full coverage on
